name: Joseph Moses Juran
background: Born in Brăila, Romania; emigrated to US 1912. Electrical engineering degree U Minnesota. Worked Western Electric/Bell Labs 1924-1941 developing statistical quality control. Post-WWII consultant; visited Japan 1954 influencing Toyota etc. Founded Juran Institute 1979. Lived to 103.

principles.name: Breakthrough Concept
principles.description: Shift from chronic (tolerated) waste to acute (targeted) defects via systematic management.
principles.falsification: When breakthrough concept leads to worse outcomes than alternatives

principles.name: Cost of Poor Quality
principles.description: Quantify waste from defects/rework to justify improvements.
principles.falsification: When cost of poor quality leads to worse outcomes than alternatives

principles.name: Managerial Responsibility
principles.description: Quality is management's job, not just inspectors. Train leaders; address human resistance to change.
principles.falsification: When managerial responsibility leads to worse outcomes than alternatives

principles.name: Pareto Principle (80/20 Rule)
principles.description: 80% problems from 20% causes ('vital few/useful many'). Focus on high-impact defects.
principles.falsification: When pareto principle (80/20 rule) leads to worse outcomes than alternatives
